source: Sports Betting CLV Research (Pinnacle, Sports Insights)
title: Early Trade Premium (Closing Line Value)
mechanism: In sports betting, bets placed >24 hours before the event show +1.2% CLV while bets in the final hour show -0.5%. Early traders capture value before market efficiency kicks in. Can we detect 'early' trades in Kalshi markets that have similar edge?

proposed_signal.condition: Trade occurs in first 25% of market lifespan (by trade count or time)
proposed_signal.action: Follow the direction of early trades more aggressively
proposed_signal.expected_edge: +2-4% improvement if early trades are informed

price_proxy_risk: LOW - measures time position, not price
novelty_vs_tested: H047 tested 'time proximity edge' but focused on LATE trades. This tests EARLY trades specifically
